verses.roman:
ei-mata hañā yei kṛṣṇa-nāma laya
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caraṇe tāṅra prema upajaya

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; hañā—becoming; yei—anyone who; kṛṣṇa-nāma laya—chants the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Lord Kṛṣṇa; tāṅra—his; prema upajaya—love of Kṛṣṇa awakens.
translation: "If one chants the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa in this manner, he will certainly awaken his dormant love for Kṛṣṇa's lotus feet."
